title: Pacifista Laser Mechanics Theory
theory: The Pacifistas don't use artificial Devil Fruits to create their laser beams. Instead, they potentially use technology derived from Kizaru's awakened Light-Light Fruit abilities, with Vegapunk creating permanent light constructs or devices that can harness and replicate the Pika Pika no Mi's properties without requiring an actual Devil Fruit.
author: MangaHelpers Forum User

source.title: My theory of Pacifistas, exactly how they can shoot lasers

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Contains theories about Vegapunk's technology revealed in later arcs

title: Kizaru-Vegapunk Connection Theory
theory: Some fans theorize a deeper connection between Admiral Kizaru and Dr. Vegapunk beyond just the laser technology. The theory suggests that Kizaru may have willingly worked closely with Vegapunk to perfect the Pacifista laser weapons, possibly as test subjects or through extensive study of his Devil Fruit abilities. This could explain why every Pacifista model uses laser weapons derived specifically from Kizaru's powers rather than other Devil Fruit abilities.
author: Screen Rant Editorial / Fan Community

source.title: A One Piece Fan Theory Proves That Dr. Vegapunk Is Actually [SPOILER]

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Contains theories about Vegapunk's identity and connections revealed in later arcs

title: Pacifista Speed Inconsistency Theory
theory: Fans have debated whether Pacifista laser beams are truly light-speed like Kizaru's attacks. The theory notes that Pre-Timeskip Straw Hats could dodge Pacifista beams (as shown in episode 402), but Luffy doesn't have time to react to Kizaru's direct light-speed attacks in certain situations. This suggests either: (1) Pacifista lasers are slower imitations of true light-speed attacks, (2) Vegapunk couldn't perfectly replicate the speed aspect, or (3) Kizaru's personal attacks have additional properties beyond just light speed.
author: VS Battles Wiki / Comic Vine Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Discusses power scaling across pre and post-timeskip episodes

title: Ancient Zoan Rarity and World Government Theory
theory: X Drake's reveal of an Ancient Zoan Devil Fruit in episode 402 sparked theories about why such rare fruits exist and their connection to the World Government. Some fans theorize that Ancient Zoan fruits may be connected to the Void Century or ancient history, and that the World Government has been collecting or monitoring these rare fruits. Drake possessing one and later becoming a Marine could be significant to this pattern.
author: One Piece Reddit Community

source.title: Various Reddit discussions about Ancient Zoan fruits

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Contains speculation about Ancient Zoans and their significance revealed in later arcs

title: Kizaru's Famous Quote Meme Theory
theory: While not a traditional plot theory, fans have extensively analyzed why Kizaru's line 'Have you ever been kicked at the speed of light?' from episode 402 became one of the most memorable and memed quotes in One Piece. The theory suggests that the line perfectly encapsulates Kizaru's character: casual, terrifying, and absurdly powerful all at once. The rhetorical question format makes it both a threat and a philosophical musing about the nature of his power.
author: One Piece Fandom Community

source.title: Borsalino Character Page - Fan Commentary
